Alice: Alice was super friendly and made the ride comfortable.
She played relaxing music and kept the car very clean.
She offered water bottles and was very punctual.
Bob: Bob drove a little fast but was very safe overall.
He knew shortcuts that saved us time.
Talkative but respectful of silence if you wanted to rest.
Charlie: His car smelled nice and was well-maintained.
Not much conversation, but got me there on time.
